ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T03:47:55 [Issue ID 4000-157819] urn:comicvine:4000-157819 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 10:12:53. [Issue ID 640507]
ComicInfo.Summary: An evil so profound it threatens all mankind... the mightiest heroes on the planet uniting to defend us all... a secret crisis of such utter finality that a countdown to civil or infinite war seems unavoidable... but have you ever wondered what really happens during Crossovers? The Seven, Payback, Teenage Kix, Fantastico and every other supe on Earth team up for an annual event like no other... and where the supes go, can a certain "five complications and a dog" be far behind? Vought-American prepare to make their move, in a story that will change the world of the Boys forever: Herogasm #1.
ComicInfo.Teams: The Boys,The Seven,Vought American,United States Secret Service,Payback
ComicInfo.Title: One: Babylon
